pages.text: The Birch Forest is a subtype of the usual $(l:biomes/forest)forest$(), though most of the normal forest's $(l:world/tree)oak trees$() are birch trees as well. Mob and structure spawning is the same as in normal forests, though some structures - namely the $(l:structures/village)village$(), the $(l:structures/outpost)outpost$(), the $(l:structures/mansion)mansion$() and the $(l:structures/witch_hut)witch hut$() - have a birch variant that spawns here. This biome has a normal, tall, hills and tall hills variant.
